verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: Just one year ago] , [ARG0: Special Counsel Robert Mueller] [V: began] [ARG1: his investigation into the Russian meddling in our 2016 presidential election that put Donald Trump in the Oval Office] . Today it continues , with no certain end yet in sight .

Just one year ago , Special Counsel Robert Mueller began his investigation into [ARG0: the Russian meddling in our 2016 presidential election] [R-ARG0: that] [V: put] [ARG1: Donald Trump] [ARG2: in the Oval Office] . Today it continues , with no certain end yet in sight .

Just one year ago , Special Counsel Robert Mueller began his investigation into the Russian meddling in our 2016 presidential election that put Donald Trump in the Oval Office . [ARGM-TMP: Today] [ARG1: it] [V: continues] , [ARGM-MNR: with no certain end yet in sight] .
